pl.marcinmazur.portfolio.service

Interface TaskService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskServiceImpl

    public interface TaskService
    Interface for managing tasks.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewTask(String taskName, String taskCategory, String taskDeadline, String taskDescription)
      Creates and saves the Task with the given name, category, deadline and description.
      Task getTask(int taskId)
      Returns the Task with given id
      List<Task> getTaskList(String taskListType)
      Returns the list of all active or inactive tasks.
      void updateTask(int taskId, String taskName, String taskCategory, String taskDate, String taskDeadline, String taskDescription, boolean taskIsActive, boolean taskIsCompleted)
      Updates the task with the given parameters

    • Method Detail

      • getTaskList

        List<Task> getTaskList(String taskListType)
        Returns the list of all active or inactive tasks.
        Parameters:
        taskListType - The String containing the type of the list. Use "active" to get all active tasks. Use any other word to get all inactive tasks.
        Returns:
        A List<Task> representing the list of tasks

      • getTask

        Task getTask(int taskId)
        Returns the Task with given id
        Parameters:
        taskId - The int containing the id of the task
        Returns:
        A Task representing the Task

      • addNewTask

        void addNewTask(String taskName,
                String taskCategory,
                String taskDeadline,
                String taskDescription)
        Creates and saves the Task with the given name, category, deadline and description.
        Parameters:
        taskName - The String containing the name of the task
        taskCategory - The String containing the category of the task
        taskDeadline - The String containing the date of deadline of the task
        taskDescription - The String containing the description of the task

      • updateTask

        void updateTask(int taskId,
                String taskName,
                String taskCategory,
                String taskDate,
                String taskDeadline,
                String taskDescription,
                boolean taskIsActive,
                boolean taskIsCompleted)
        Updates the task with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        taskId - The int containing the id of the task
        taskName - The String containing the name of the task
        taskCategory - The String containing the category of the task
        taskDate - The String containing the date of added of the task
        taskDeadline - The String containing the date of deadline of the task
        taskDescription - The String containing the description of the task
        taskIsActive - The boolean containing the isActive status of the task
        taskIsCompleted - The boolean containing the isCompleted status of the task
